mapper.select: select count(*) from purchasehistory where buyerid = #{id}

select idx, buyerid, gdsname, num, price, origin, category, dop, image_name, image_size, store, area, del_status from (SELECT ROWNUM rn, tt.* FROM (SELECT * FROM purchasehistory order by idx desc) TT where buyerid = #{buyerid} and #{area} in (select area from buyer)) where rn >= #{startNo} AND rn <= #{endNo}
mapper.insert: insert into payment(idx, buyer_id, DOP, name, phonenum, address, del_status, num) values (payment_seq.nextval, #{BuyerID}, sysdate, #{name}, #{phonenum}, #{address}, '배송전', #{num})
mapper.select: select seller_id, name, price, category, image_name from sellgds where idx = #{sellerGdsVO_idx}
mapper.update: update payment set seller_id = #{seller_id}, goods_name = #{name}, price = #{price}, category = #{category}, img_name = #{image_name} where idx = (SELECT idx FROM (SELECT * FROM payment ORDER BY idx DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1)
update buyer set money = money - (#{price} * #{num}) where id = #{id}
